resources.string: Enable vibrations
Global switch for all vibrations from this app
Alarm timeout
Alarm on the watch will dismiss itself after %1$s seconds. Use this to prevent alarm going indefinitely when watch is charging and you are not nearby for example.
Mute intervals
List of mute intervals that can be selected for timed mute on the watch.
Timed mute do not disturb

When you activate timed mute, VC can also put your phone (and subsequently the watch) into do not disturb mode to also mute vibrations from native notifications.

Current setting: %1$s.
Vibration delay

VC will vibrate %1$s milliseconds after notification appears to prevent clashing with native vibrations.

Increase this value to further reduce clashing with native vibrations.

Decrease this value to make vibrations more timely (only recommended if you have dealt with native vibrations in other way such as having do not disturb constantly enabled).
Vibration type
Vibrations
Watch filter
Respect Android\'s do not disturb mode
VC will NOT vibrate for notifications that would be muted under do not disturb mode.
VC will IGNORE do not disturb mode and vibrate even if notification was supposed to be muted under do not disturb.
Only vibrate for notifications that vibrated in the first place.

VC will ONLY create additional vibrations for notifications that would vibrate in the first place (even without Vibration Center app installed.)

For example silent passive weather notifications will NOT vibrate.

VC will ALSO create additional vibrations for notifications that would not vibrate in the first place (even without Vibration Center app installed.)

For example silent passive weather notifications WILL vibrate.
Do not vibrate in theater mode
VC will NOT create additional vibrations when in theater mode.
VC WILL create additional vibrations regardless of the theater mode.
Do not vibrate when phone\'s screen is on
VC will NOT create additional vibrations when phone\'s screen is on.
VC WILL create additional vibrations when phone\'s screen is on.
Do not vibrate when charging
VC will NOT create additional vibrations when watch is charging.
VC WILL create additional vibrations regardless of the watch\'s charging state.
Do not create alarm in theater mode
VC will NOT create alarm when in theater mode.
VC WILL create alarm regardless of the theater mode.
Do not create alarm when charging
VC will NOT create alarm when watch is charging.
VC WILL create alarm regardless of the watch\'s charging state.
Vibration pattern
Turn watch\'s screen on
When vibrating, VC WILL force turn on watch\'s display.
VC will NOT force turn on watch\'s display. Please not that Android Wear itself may still turn on the screen instead. VC cannot control this, put the watch into do not disturb mode to prevent it.
Spam filter
Minimum time between vibrations
VC will not create any additional vibration if previous notification from this app vibrated less than %1$s milliseconds ago.
Do not vibrate for notfication updates

VC will NOT vibrate for updates to existing notifications.

For example if there is already a chat notification on your watch and it just gets updated with new messages (no new separate notifications), VC will NOT vibrate for that.

VC WILL vibrate for updates to existing notifications.

For example if there is already a chat notification on your watch and it just gets updated with new messages (no new separate notifications), VC will ALSO vibrate for that.
Do not vibrate for subsequent notifications

VC will ONLY vibrate for first notification from this app.

For example if you already have email notification on your watch and you got another email notification, VC will NOT vibrate for these subsequent emails.

VC will vibrate for ALL notifications from this app, first and subsequent ones.

For example if you already have email notification on your watch and you got another email notification, VC will ALSO vibrate for these subsequent emails.
Ignore "Local Only" request

Some apps can request that their notifications will stay local only and not get mirrored to the watch (for example Play Store does that for update notifications). VC will RESPECT that request and not vibrate for these notifications.

Some apps can request that their notifications will stay local only and not get mirrored to the watch (for example Play Store does that for update notifications). VC will IGNORE that request and vibrate anyway for these notifications.
Vibrate for persistent notifications
VC will NOT vibrate for persistent notifications (ones that cannot be swiped away from the notification tray).
VC WILL vibrate for persistent notifications (ones that cannot be swiped away from the notification tray).
Excluding regex
List of regular expressions (case sensitive). If notification will contain ANY of these, it will NOT vibrate.
Content filter
General filter
Including regex
List of regular expressions (case sensitive). Notification MUST contain ANY of these in order to vibrate.
Alarm trigger regex
List of regular expressions (case sensitive). If notification will contain ANY of these, notification will vibrate in alarm mode even if default mode is set to single vibration.
Alarm mode
Snooze duration
Snoozed alarms will return after %1$s seconds.
On-watch mute actions
